pageContent: 8 THE SPHERE OF HOD Splendor Reason The Individual Mind Systems: Magick, Science Contact point of the Masters Language and Visual Images Symbols: Names and Versicles, Apron. Planet: Mercury Color: Orange Of the Thirty-Two Paths of Wisdom the Eighth is known as the Absolute or Perfect Intelligence . The Sphere of the Operation of Hod is that of Koka b, the Stellar Light,bestowing elegance, swiftness, scientific knowledge and art, and constancy of speech, and it ru les the sphere of the action of the planet Mercury. Elohim Tzabaoth is a God of Hosts and of Armies, of Mercy and Agreement, of Praise and honor, ruling the Universe in Wisdom and Harmony. And its Archangel is Michael, the Prince of Splendor and of Wisdom, and the name of its order of Angels is Beni Elohim, or Sons of the Gods, who are also called the Order of Archangels.
